Problem 1

Problem (i)

\begin{align*} F(x) &= P(X \leq x\\ &= \sum_{A} P(X \leq x, A)\\ &= P(X \leq x, A) + P(X \leq x, A^c)\\ &= P(X \leq x|A)P(A) + P(X \leq x|A^c)P(A^c)\\ &= F_1 â€¦
